body:
This is a bugfix for spack monitor saving locally - currently we are double dumping json! :scream: 

The save function on the client already does the dumping, so it was redundant to do it again to the input.

cc @alecbcs 

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: Fixing double dump of json for spack monitor save local
